none: Indexed street map of Chicago and vicinity
Map title: Street map of Chicago

Scale approximately 1:64,360 ; (W 87°50'44"--W 87°31'26"/N 42°04'01"--N 41°38'20"). ; Panel title.; Includes double index.; Area of 1933 World's Fair identified.; Black outline map with major addresses, bus and elevated train lines, administrative borders, and places of interest marked in red.; "Hearne Cartographic Productions," "Copyright by Hearne Brothers."

Homepage at Northwestern University Libraries Digital Collections
Northwestern University Libraries’ Map & Atlas Collection allows access to an ever-growing selection of our cartographic resources in high resolution.
